items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [nvm-auto-use (martvdmoosdijk) (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/martvdmoosdijk/zsh-nvm-auto-use) - Automatically switches node version with `nvm use` when a `.nvmrc` is detected.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome European Tech
items.content_text:

*   [Trint](https://trint.com/) üá¨üáß - AI SaaS transcription software with collaborative text editing and commenting tools, document creation with multiple transcription excerpts, and realtime + multi-language transcription capabilities. Specialized in providing services for news and media enterprises.

items.title: Awesome Vlc
items.content_text:
### VLC web & lua extensions

*   [vlc-mcp-server (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/piebro/vlc-mcp-server) -  An MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server to play and control movies using the VLC HTTP API and natural language using an LLM.
items.content_html:
VLC web & lua extensions

  • vlc-mcp-server (‚≠ê7) - An MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server to play and control movies using the VLC HTTP API and natural language using an LLM.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Community

*   [Is This Tech Dead?](https://www.isthistechdead.com/angular) - Is Angular dead?

### Builders / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-rspack (‚≠ê75)](https://github.com/nrwl/angular-rspack) - [Rspack (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rspack) plugin and tooling for Angular applications.

### Component / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [swc-angular-plugin (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/jscutlery/devkit/tree/main/packages/swc-angular-plugin) - SWC (Speedy Web Compiler) is a lightning-fast JavaScript/TypeScript compiler, but it doesn't support Angular so you need this plugin.
*   [wdio-harness (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/badisi/wdio-harness) - WebdriverIO support for Angular component test harnesses.

### JSON Forms / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-formwork (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/TheNordicOne/ngx-formwork) - This package provides a framework for creating Angular Reactive Forms, based on a configuration. This configuration can come from a server in the form of JSON or directly from an object written in TypeScript.

### Scroll / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [horizontal-scroller (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/miminerd/horizontal-scroller) - Infinite horizontal scroller for Angular apps using Tailwind.

### Additional / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [fsm-state-manager (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/NikitaTopchii/fsm-state-manager) - A simple, flexible and strongly-typed finite state machine manager for managing state transitions in Angular or any TypeScript-based application.
items.content_html:
Community

  • Is This Tech Dead? - Is Angular dead?

Builders / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-rspack (‚≠ê75) - Rspack (‚≠ê12k) plugin and tooling for Angular applications.

Component / Google Developer Experts

  • swc-angular-plugin (‚≠ê263) - SWC (Speedy Web Compiler) is a lightning-fast JavaScript/TypeScript compiler, but it doesn't support Angular so you need this plugin.
  • wdio-harness (‚≠ê7) - WebdriverIO support for Angular component test harnesses.

JSON Forms / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-formwork (‚≠ê4) - This package provides a framework for creating Angular Reactive Forms, based on a configuration. This configuration can come from a server in the form of JSON or directly from an object written in TypeScript.

Scroll / Google Developer Experts

  • horizontal-scroller (‚≠ê2) - Infinite horizontal scroller for Angular apps using Tailwind.

Additional / Google Developer Experts

  • fsm-state-manager (‚≠ê4) - A simple, flexible and strongly-typed finite state machine manager for managing state transitions in Angular or any TypeScript-based application.
